newsitems.title: Official UNDERTALE Merch Now Available for Preorder
newsitems.author: fwugradiation
newsitems.contents: Hey guys. You can pre-order official UNDERTALE merchandise now. There are some shirts, stickers, and a poster. Will let you all know when we add even more. Here on Fangamer. Go Hog Wild

newsitems.title: Conversations With Myself: On Undertale s Universal Appeal
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (Adam Smith)
newsitems.contents: Undertale is a brilliant game and I want everyone to play it. I worry that people will think it’s so deeply rooted in nostalgia that they’ll need a degree in RPGs to enjoy it, or that it’s a series of quirky in-jokes. It isn’t but I don’t want to tell you precisely what...

newsitems.title: Game Of The Month: October Undertale
newsitems.author: contact@rockpapershotgun.com (RPS)
newsitems.contents: You can defeat Game of the Month by pointing out that it’s running a week late, but you could also progress by claiming friendship and offering Game of the Month a hug. As it is here, so it is in inventive, uplifting RPG Undertale . As a human cast down into monster territory, you must explore...
